Articles.Content:
I made a JTOL plane, very predictable! (to crash...) ;P

to get least chance of crashing 8), engage SAS, roll cart to about 15mps then press space 2 times. after plane gets over water, WILL malfunction and spin out. so press space after nose dives to sace crew.

REQUIRES MODS: Cart mod from (http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/kerbal-space-program-mods)

If attachment link does not work, i uploaded to mediafire:

http://www./?s2b0vptp1w5b7nz
got any pic for this as most wont dl if there are no pics..... just giving ya a heads up about it.
